name: @rengine/python-adapters
description: Python adapters for Rengine - Qt GUI, Blender addon, and CLI tools

scripts.install:all: bun app-qt:install && bun blender:install && bun app-cli:install
scripts.test:all: bun app-qt:test && bun blender:test && bun app-cli:test
scripts.check:all: bun app-qt:check && bun blender:check && bun app-cli:check
scripts.lint:all: bun app-qt:lint && bun blender:lint && bun app-cli:lint
scripts.format:all: bun app-qt:format && bun blender:format && bun app-cli:format
scripts.type:all: bun app-qt:type && bun blender:type && bun app-cli:type
scripts.clean:all: bun app-qt:clean && bun blender:clean && bun app-cli:clean
scripts.app-qt:run: cd app-qt && uv run python -m application.main
scripts.app-qt:build: cd app-qt && uv run python build.py
scripts.app-qt:check: cd app-qt && uv run python -m py_compile application/**/*.py && uv run python -c "import application.main; print('✓ Import check passed')"
scripts.app-qt:lint: cd app-qt && uv run ruff check .
scripts.app-qt:format: cd app-qt && uv run ruff check --fix . && uv run ruff format .
scripts.app-qt:type: cd app-qt && uv run ty check .
scripts.app-qt:clean: cd app-qt && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete && rm -rf .venv
scripts.blender:build: cd blender && uv run python build.py
scripts.blender:check: cd blender && uv run python -c "import gtaLib.dff; import gtaLib.img; print('✓ DragonFF import check passed')"
scripts.blender:lint: cd blender && uv run ruff check .
scripts.blender:format: cd blender && uv run ruff check --fix . && uv run ruff format .
scripts.blender:type: cd blender && uv run ty check .
scripts.blender:install:addon: cd blender && echo 'To install as Blender addon: Edit > Preferences > Add-ons > Install from File > select dragonff.zip'
scripts.blender:clean: cd blender && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete && rm -rf .venv
scripts.app-cli:run: cd app-cli && uv run python cli.py
scripts.app-cli:run:script: cd app-cli && uv run python run_cli.py
scripts.app-cli:check: cd app-cli && uv run python -c "import cli; from cli import RengineCLI; print('✓ CLI functionality check passed')"
scripts.app-cli:lint: cd app-cli && uv run ruff check .
scripts.app-cli:format: cd app-cli && uv run ruff check --fix . && uv run ruff format .
scripts.app-cli:type: cd app-cli && uv run ty check .
scripts.app-cli:help: cd app-cli && uv run python cli.py --help
scripts.app-cli:clean: cd app-cli && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete && rm -rf .venv
scripts.gta:test:img: cd app-cli && python3 cli.py img info /home/blefnk/Documents/reliverse/rengine/preloaded/resources/gta-sa/custom.img
scripts.gta:test:dff: cd app-cli && find /home/blefnk/Documents/reliverse/rengine/preloaded/resources/gta-sa -name '*.dff' -size -100k | head -1 | xargs python3 cli.py dff info
scripts.gta:test:batch: cd app-cli && python3 cli.py batch analyze /home/blefnk/Documents/reliverse/rengine/preloaded/resources/gta-sa --format dff --max-files 5
scripts.docker:build: echo 'Building Python environment...' && docker build -t rengine-python .

author: Rengine Team
